languages.text: Омерзительные очертания противного свету Бога-Императора устройства не вызывали ни малейших сомнений в том, что предназначение линзы было омерзительным и противным душе истинного слуги Его.

traits.locale_text: Омерзительные очертания противного свету Бога-Императора устройства не вызывали ни малейших сомнений в том, что предназначение линзы было омерзительным и противным душе истинного слуги Его.

languages.text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.
languages.original_text: Омерзительные очертания противного свету Бога-Императора устройства не вызывали ни малейших сомнений в том, что предназначение линзы было омерзительным и противным душе истинного слуги Его.

traits.locale_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor removed all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and run counter to all that makes up a soul of a true servant of His.

The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor removed all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and run counter to all that makes up a soul of a true servant of His.

The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and opposing to a soul of a true servant of His.

The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and opposing to a soul of a true servant of His.

The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

languages.text: Der grässliche Umriss eines Geräts, das einen solchen Gegensatz zum Licht des Gottimperators darstellte, zerschlug jeden Zweifel: Für einen wahren Diener des Imperators konnte der vorgesehene Zweck dieser Linse nur abstoßend und beleidigend sein.
languages.original_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

traits.locale_text: Der grässliche Umriss eines Geräts, das einen solchen Gegensatz zum Licht des Gottimperators darstellte, zerschlug jeden Zweifel: Für einen wahren Diener des Imperators konnte der vorgesehene Zweck dieser Linse nur abstoßend und widerwärtig sein.

languages.text: L'abominable silhouette d'un appareil aussi contraire à la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu dissipe tout doute quant à l'utilisation prévue de la lentille : elle serait tout à fait répugnante et offensante pour l'âme de l'un de Ses véritables serviteurs.
languages.original_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

traits.locale_text: L'abominable silhouette d'un appareil aussi contraire à la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu dissipe tout doute quant à l'utilisation prévue de la lentille : elle serait tout à fait répugnante et hostile pour l'âme de l'un de Ses véritables serviteurs.

languages.text: 这个装置发出的可憎光芒，几乎与神皇的明光恰恰相反。无须任何怀疑，这架透镜肯定是用于某种极其邪恶的目的，与神皇虔诚仆从的灵魂格格不入。
languages.original_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

traits.locale_text: 这个装置发出的可憎光芒，几乎与神皇的明光恰恰相反。无须任何怀疑，这架透镜肯定是用来某种极其邪恶的地方，与神皇虔诚仆从的灵魂格格不入。

languages.text: 神帝陛下の光とは正反対であるこの装置の忌まわしい輪郭から、レンズの使用目的がいかに不快であり、真の神皇の奉仕者の魂にとって不快にさせることであることは明らかだ。
languages.original_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

traits.locale_text: 神帝陛下の光とは正反対であるこの装置の忌まわしい輪郭から、レンズの目的は、陛下の真の僕の魂が徹底的に嫌悪し、敵対すべきものであることは明らかだ。

languages.text: El abominable contorno de un dispositivo tan opuesto a la luz del Dios Emperador disipaba toda duda de que el uso que se pretendía dar a la lente era totalmente repugnante y ofensivo al alma de un verdadero siervo del Señor de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

traits.locale_text: El abominable contorno de un dispositivo tan opuesto a la luz del Dios Emperador disipaba toda duda de que el uso que se pretendía dar a la lente era totalmente repugnante y contrario al alma de un verdadero siervo Suyo.

languages.text: Tanrı İmparator'un ışığına böyle zıt bir cihazın menfur silüeti bile, merceğin kullanım amacının O'nun gerçek hizmetkârlarının ruhuna bütünüyle tiksindirici ve saldırganca geleceği konusundaki tüm şüpheleri ortadan kaldırıyordu.
languages.original_text: The abominable outline of a device so antithetical to the light of the God-Emperor dispelled all doubt that the intended use of the lens would be thoroughly repugnant and offensive to the soul of a true servant of His.

traits.locale_text: Tanrı İmparator'un ışığına böyle zıt bir cihazın menfur silüeti bile, merceğin kullanım amacının O'nun gerçek hizmetkârlarının ruhuna bütünüyle tiksindirici ve saldırganca geleceği konusundaki tüm şüpheleri ortadan kaldırıyordu.
